alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:41PM CDT until May 12 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 541 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nellieburg, or near Meridian, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Meridian, Collinsville, Marion, Nellieburg, Toomsuba, Meridian Station, Lauderdale, Zero, Martin, Meehan, Savoy, Suqualena, Kewanee, Alamucha and Daleville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
